channel.title: Game crashes at one point only
channel.description:
So,after not playing the game for a few months because of the annoying crash bug, i decided to re-install and replay the whole game up to the point where i last quit.
to my suprise,the cause of the crash is still the same.
MAP:bm_c2a3a location: around -863.977356 283.890533 where you walk through the rail tunnels to load the next "map" screenshot here: ![](upload://hohPUBjYq6udNR4KCAdKCOfhZjG.jpeg)
No matter what i do,my game always crashes when i walk forward to load the next stage of the game. i tried re-installing a few times,but that doesn't seem to work. also, manually loading the next map results in me standing there without any weapons to fight, so that's not an option either.
any help would be greatly appreciated.

item.title: Game crashes at one point only
item.dc:creator: Mr_GameCrazy
item.description:
Swaggless:

Ummmm… isn’t that from On a Rail Uncut?

I may be wrong, but I don’t think so.

It’s from the first Apprehension map. The B1 and B2 maps of Text’s On a Rail Uncut is based off of that.

Read full topic
item.source: Game crashes at one point only

item.title: Game crashes at one point only
item.dc:creator: Cpl.1nsane
item.description:
I suspect it might just be an engine/hardware limitation issue that causes the crash due to transitioning between two large maps, the game throws a hissy fit and doesn’t want to work.

Computers can be such silly things. :freeman:

Read full topic

item.title: Game crashes at one point only
item.dc:creator: CatzEyes93
item.description:
I am curious, does deleting cache files stored on the cloud help at all? https://forums.steampowered.com/forums/showthread.php?t=2470784

I offered this to another guy but I dont know if this helps at all.

item.title: Game crashes at one point only
item.dc:creator: Kitty_Cat
item.description:
So,after not playing the game for a few months because of the annoying crash bug, i decided to re-install and replay the whole game up to the point where i last quit.

to my suprise,the cause of the crash is still the same.

MAP:bm_c2a3a
location: around -863.977356 283.890533 where you walk through the rail tunnels to load the next “map”
screenshot here:

1920×1080 170 KB

No matter what i do,my game always crashes when i walk forward to load the next stage of the game. i tried re-installing a few times,but that doesn’t seem to work.
also, manually loading the next map results in me standing there without any weapons to fight, so that’s not an option either.

any help would be greatly appreciated.
